CustomField.formula: IF(LEN(Portfolio__r.Property_Street__c)>0, Portfolio__r.Property_Street__c& " " , "" ) & BR() & IF(LEN(Portfolio__r.Property_City__c)>0, Portfolio__r.Property_City__c& ", " , "" )& IF(LEN(Portfolio__r.Property_State__c)>0, Portfolio__r.Property_State__c& " " , "" )& IF(LEN(Portfolio__r.Property_Zip_Code__c)>0, Portfolio__r.Property_Zip_Code__c,"")
CustomField.label: Property Address
